__e: Did they tell you I was dying?
They told you it was a good idea.
Did they tell you that you belonged here?
No,I know that that's what they told you to say.
To do the one thing your parents told you not to do.
To do the one thing your parents told you not to do.
Well,Hey,If That's What They Said, Then It Must Be True.
I can't believe they let you out.
I mean, they... they let you out early, so you must have said something, right?
Oh, so they just let you out, huh?
You haven't got any lieutenants, none of your guys, your crew, to do it for you?
You didn't call the police when you got her message because they let you down so many times when your father was killed.
Guess you're doing such a good job they're letting you leave early.
That's a stupid name. Your parents give you that?
Why did your parents give you a girl's name?
And they've given you a new case?
They put a gun on you.
So, I saw they gave you a car.
You don't even know what they gave you, do you?
The people who gave you the 70 grand that you gave to my brother.
They've had you on a lot of medication, so I don't know if you remember, but I've been visiting you for a couple of weeks now.
What kind of shit did your parents do to get you that thing?
Did they do anything to you?
What did they do to you?
Oh, I'm sorry I took so long. Did they hurt you?
My love, we won't let them get away with it, those who hurt you.
Did they hurt you or make you do something...?
I don't know what they did to you, Jack, but it must have been pretty bad.
You know, I, uh, I never agreed with what they did to you.
So they did this to you because you wouldn't kill me?
Yeah, you're still alive, why didn't they kill you?
They didn't make you take your mother's car, did they?
They didn't believe you,but it all worked out in the end.
Yeah, I know, and I believe it's being relocated a few feet over.
I still remember when they put you in my arms for the first time.
Fella, I don't know who put you up to this, but they're making a jackass out of you.
